title: Ticket #3238: Priorities are ignored in local universe
description:
When we throttle the number of local universe jobs using, for example: 

  START_LOCAL_UNIVERSE = TotalLocalJobsRunning < 1

and submit some local universe jobs with priorities: 

  universe = local
  executable = /bin/sleep
  arguments = 10
  priority = $(process)
  queue 10

the jobs are not executed in order of their priorities.

This is important for us because Pegasus runs several different types of jobs in the local universe (stage in, stage out, etc.) that all have different priorities (e.g. stage out before stage in).
